hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) performed Tawaf of the Ka`ba while riding a camel, and whenever he came in front of the Corner, he pointed towards it (with something)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ أَشَارَ إِلَى الرُّكْنِ إِذَا أَتَى عَلَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever pointed towards the Corner (Black Stone)
